description: Triangle T(n,k) of number of digraphs with a quasi-source on n unlabeled nodes and with k arcs, k=0,1,..,n*(n-1).
links: V. Jovovic and G. Kilibarda, Enumeration of labeled quasi-initially connected digraphs, Discrete Math., 224 (2000), 151-163.
example: Table starts:[1],[0,1,1],[0,0,3,4,4,1,1],[0,0,0,7,21,37,47,38,27,13,5,1,1],...Number of digraphs with a quasi-source on 3 unlabeled nodes is 13=3+4+4+1+1.
crossrefs: Row sums give A049512. Cf. A057270-A057278.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Sep 14 2000
